course.subject: RMBI
course.name: Mobile Intelligence and Business
course.description: This course will cover the basic principles in mobile communications, data mining and database management. The course will provide an introduction on the techniques for mobility data mining, mobile behavior modeling and data visualization. Students will learn essential concepts and techniques for mobile business intelligence such as real-time, location-based marketing and recommendations. The cutting-edge research on the relationship between social networks and mobile trajectories will also be a focus. Case studies and demo systems will make the course experiences in-depth, exciting and hands-on.
